coreAttributes.name: torch
coreAttributes.description: A wooden branch, old rags, something flamable, a spark of Arcane to make it last longer and burn hotter. It can bring light into dark places - and it is a club one can hit and burn someone with.
coreAttributes.equipText: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(ready)] [npc.her] torch in anticipation of using it as a weapon.

hitDescriptions.hitText: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(swing)] [npc.her] torch at [npc2.name], grinning as it connects with [npc2.her] body!
Striking out at [npc2.name] with [npc.her] torch, [npc.name] [npc.verb(grin)] as it burns [npc2.herHim] on the [npc2.arm]!
[npc.Name] [npc.verb(swipe)] at [npc2.name] with [npc.her] torch, causing [npc2.herHim] to stagger back as [npc2.she] [npc2.verb(get)] whacked in the [npc2.arm]!

missDescriptions.missText: Striking out at [npc2.name] with [npc.her] torch, [npc.name] [npc.verb(let)] out a frustrated cry as [npc.she] [npc.verb(miss)] [npc.her] target!
With a quick step forwards, [npc.name] [npc.verb(swipe)] at [npc2.name] with [npc.her] torch, but [npc.she] [npc.verb(miss)] [npc.her] target!
